snippet.title: Mystiqa - Multi-Platform Teaser!
snippet.description:
Mystiqa is a fantasy action-rpg inspired heavily by classics such as Zelda, Final Fantasy Adventure and Dragons Quest but also modern day titles such as Dark Souls. Offering randomized and feature rich biomes, the player utilizes a hybrid class system that allows them mix and match their character to exactly how they want to play the game!

Coming to PC and consoles near you in 2021!
